description.desc1: The node merges different transformational parts of two differen transformation nodes into one.

pos.descript: select the translational part from one of the parents

rot.descript: select the rotation from one of the parents

scale.descript: select the scale part from one of the parents

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
